Package installation¶

Warning

Link for download may not work at the moment

Linux Ubuntu 20.04 LTS¶

Download Pyplitudes¶

You can download the latest version here:

  • Pyplitudes 0.3

  • In case download link is not working, you can clone the repository:

    • git@gitlab.com:Emil-Sujkowski/Pyplitudes.git

Dependencies for Pyplitudes package¶

To compile, run and test Pyplitudes, you need the following packages:

  • gcc (>=9.4.0)

    $ sudo  apt-get install gcc g++
$ gcc --version
$ g++ --version

  • python (>=3.8.10)

    $ sudo apt-get install python3

  • git (>=2.25.1)

    $ sudo apt-get install git
$ git --version

  • pip3 (>=20.0.2)

    $ sudo apt-get install python3-pip
$ pip3 --version

  • pybind11 (>=2.5.0)

    $ sudo pip3 install pybind11==2.5.0
$ python3
$ import pybind11
$ pybind11.__version__
$ exit()

  • numpy (>=1.12.3)

    $ sudo pip3 install numpy
$ python3
$ import numpy
$ numpy.__version__
$ exit()

  • pytest (>=6.2.5)

    $ sudo pip3 install pytest
$ python3
$ import pytest
$ pytest.__version__
$ exit()

  • h5py (>=3.0.0)

    $ sudo pip3 install --no-binary=h5py h5py
$ python3
$ import h5py
$ h5py.__version__
$ exit()

  • setuptools (>=61.0.0)

    $ sudo pip3 install setuptools
$ python3
$ import setuptools
$ setuptools.__version__
$ exit()
